sentence.Network_en: This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经引发了无数流血的战争。

sentence.Network_en: Villagers get together every year to keep this age - old tradition alive.
sentence.Network_cn: 村民每年都聚到一块儿,继续他们古老的传统.

sentence.Network_en: We can only try to hold fast to the age-old values of honesty, decency and concern for others.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们只能努力坚守那些古老的价值观：诚实、正派、关心他人。

entry.tran: （故事、传统或问题）古老的，已存在很久的
entry.def: An age-old story, tradition, or problem has existed for many generations or centuries.

example.ex: This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
example.tran: 这场由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经引发了无数流血的战争。

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to or lasting from times long ago;

sentences.sentence: "the antique fear that days would dwindle away to complete darkness"
